website_summaries.verdict: Offers a wide range of shades to match practically any brow color.
pros: Comes in 11 different shade duos, from fair to dark to red tones
Both shades are meant to be used together to create a natural brow look
Red shades are difficult to find in many other brow powders
cons: Doesn't come with a brush or applicator

customer_reviews.title: This is the best brow product!  I finally have my  eureka moment!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many brow products and they always looked unnatural. I am fair skinned and usually wear the second to the lightest foundation color. My brows are sparse and nonexistent at the outside edge. My hair is white and had been brown. I got the taupe color and I couldn’t be happier. It is easy to use, looks natural, and adds color and definition to my face. I thought that the color might be too light when I first opened the compact. It turned out to be perfect. The color really lasts, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: I felt like this brow powder in the color taupe was way ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back. My opinion may not be true because this is my first time getting this no smudge brow powder. I normally buy the Anastasia dip brow blonde, taupe or soft brown brown depending on my hair color. I felt like this brow powder in the color taupe was way to light. Personally I think it was a light blonde shade. I also think it could be a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Part of my eyebrow arsenal
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but I still like to use a pencil. This product is great for filling in little gaps. You can go as light as you want or quite a bit darker - very versatile. I also have the eyebrow pom from Anastasia in two shades. My brows are so bad I need an arsenal of products due to my lack of skill in creating normal looking eyebrows. Hopefully I will get better at it. This product really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me so I purchased it and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: deborah cristaldi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stuff
customer_reviews.text: There is no shortage of light brownish eyeshadows that a girl with brownish blond hair *could* use as a brow powder, but somehow, they're never quite the right shade. This brow powder is perfect. The shade is at the perfect saturation level - brown eyeshadows tend to be too saturated and warm colored to look right as brow powder. This powder also stays in place very well and lasts a long time - I "put on ma brows" every single morning and one of these brow powders lasts me 2-3 years. Anastasia won a lifetime customer with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heddys

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser, who is MAC certified, recommended this to me for my light eye brows. I have dark brown natural hair color with very light eye brows. I use the lighter side, or mix the two. It only takes very little to darken my brows. This product is expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: greg warner

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Would Have Found This Product Years Ago
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated that other brow products (high-end and drugstore) were just not working for me--mostly it was a color issue. Then, looking for cruelty-free products online I came across the Anastasia Brow Duo in taupe. I have very sparse brows but the color of this brow duo is natural and the application is smooth and easy. I wish I would have found this product years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Brow powder I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using Anastasia Brow powder for over 10 years taupe it stay on and easy to apply. I have very thin brows and it makes all the difference in my brow line the two shades of taupe make it easier to soften the brow and it stays on all day. i can't say enough good things about this product. Try it, it is the best i have ever used. thank you for having such a good product. I have blond hair & taupe is perfect for blondes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product w/great staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because of the higher price point, but it's well worth the price. This is far superior to any other brow product I've ever used, and should last quite a while due to the high quality. I bought the Taupe/Brown Powder Duo which is a perfect color match. Definitely stays on until I wash it off (easily w/regular soap and water) although I use clear brow gel over it just in case. One of my favorite items in my makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural looking brows and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this product would have much staying power, but it's actually pretty awesome. The powder makes it really forgiving if I make a mistake, and it makes my brows look really natural. I've also tried the brow wiz, but cannot create the same shape that I like with this duo. I use the lighter color on the inner part of my brow, and the dark on the outer, and top it with ABH clear gel. It's going to take ages to go through this! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: asdfjkl23

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly grey hair. I color a light blonde with greys in my brows. I still have some black hairs in my brows and try to color them to but it doesn’t last long. If I plucked all the grey I wouldn’t have much brows. I’ve tried lots but didn’t look natural and hard to cover the grey in brows. This taupe looks natural and covers. I want to try the taupe dip. Best I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t use anything else
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite eyebrow powder for YEARS!! I refuse to use any other brand or product. The color is natural, it’s super light on your face, and it doesn’t look like you used oil pastels or craft paint to fill in your brows. Although it is a little pricey, it will last you at least 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many eyebrow products. I always come back to this brand. The powder comes in two tones. I wish you could get a compact with one color. The pencil is of good quality. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MOLLYB

customer_reviews.title: True and lasting color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Taupe and the soft brown since I wasn’t sure which color I’d fall under. I stuck with the soft brown. The darker shade has a reddish undertone to it. I have dark strawberry blonde hair so it matches well.
customer_reviews.author: TheBookCollector

customer_reviews.title: Brow powder case content
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I tend to only need one of the two shades so half the product goes unused which makes the item a little pricey. I wish the item contained only one shade of color.
customer_reviews.author: E. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product from a well known brow expert, Anastasia!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It works well and very naturally to fill in the spare spots in my brows. Very natural looking. Lasts for many months. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: As I have white, white hair and similar eyebrows, the taupe colors work really well for me. I use a little of each color so it blends well. Some of the eyebrow colors for 'Blonde' have more red in them than I like and the Anastasia Brow Powder Duo in Taupe is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyebrow Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder. I have very little natural brows and microblading. This product fully covers and looks very natural and stays for the entire day, even through super sweaty Crossfit workouts. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Eve

customer_reviews.title: This contains toxic parabens.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to see that this well known brand sells eyebrow powder that contains parabens. Parabens are toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara l.

customer_reviews.title: Color lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use. You will need your own brush to apply. It goes on easily and lasts all day. I thought it would be a little larger. It seems a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pankey

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting eyebrow powder
customer_reviews.text: This is now the third time I have purchased this eyebrow powder. I absolutely love it. It goes on well and is able to last through my workday and workout. It never smears or fades until I wash my face at night. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wellreadcorgi

customer_reviews.title: The Best Brow Product on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I love this product......as long as you have a good angled brush to apply it, this creamy powder will make your brows look full and will last all day into the evening. Its very natural looking, glides on and a little goes a long way. I hope they don't stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: LeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Great color way mix
customer_reviews.text: A little darker than I thought it would be, but color is good with my skin and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: molly56A

customer_reviews.title: Love the natural colors and choices
customer_reviews.text: This brow powder is wonderful and stays on all day for me. I use it with the Anastasia Beverly Hill taupe pencil and the color is absolutely wonderful....Doesn't turn and also last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: JJ in Florida

customer_reviews.title: It makes my skimpy brows look good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this for my brows. I have all types of eyebrow makeup and this one is good. Easy to use and looks natural. Seems to last throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Fan

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but I could find something of equal quality for 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad, but I could find something of equal quality for 1/3 the price. Upset I spent as much as I did on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have dirty blonde hair and light eyebrows. I like that these two colors can be mixed or used on their own. I ordered taupe and I am glad that I did. I think blonde would have been too light.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for blonde eyebrows.
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are very light. Easy to apply to blende w/blonde eyebrows. No red tint. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best product for brows!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Anastasia Beverly Hills brow powder! My eyebrows are so sparse and the two shades make for a more natural look for eyebrows that don’t look drawn on. This was a repurchase and I plan on buying again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I have ash blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: and this color does the trick for my brows... Apparently they used to have a "ash blonde" color and they don't have it anymore so this was the next best choice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brows!!
customer_reviews.text: Best brow powder!! I swear by Anastasia of BH!! This product is TOP NOTCh!! A little goes a long way, you can go light or build the color for a more bolder look. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JSchu

customer_reviews.title: Very natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyebrow coloring I've tried yet. Very natural looking and stays on all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent in color.
customer_reviews.text: I use this item almost exclusively but the last buy...the lt shade color was slightly off. It yellowed my brow. I combined the two to cut the color but had a brow darker than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Corena

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long/great value
customer_reviews.text: I used up my last one to the very end. Great value for a long use. I like this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Terisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love this product easy work to make eyebrows look great
customer_reviews.author: Ocalota13

customer_reviews.title: Winner after searching forever for a good eyebrow product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The color is perfect and application is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: L. Reinert

customer_reviews.title: Love this brow powder!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this powder! I have very light eyebrows and eyelashes so I always fill my brows in. I am naturally a dirty blonde but highlight my hair! I think the Taupe color is great. Dark enough but not too dark! I just use a Morphe brush I got when I ordered a brush set with them, it is very similar to the Anastasia brush! I originally used the Ka Brow by benefit (which I love) but this powder looks a lot more natural but still is dark enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little compact. Easy to apply and perfect for filling in your brow.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and natural looking brows.
customer_reviews.text: I love the dual brow powder, it stays on until I take it off and it goes on smooth for natural looking brows. I get compliments because my brows look so good. I have tried other brands and they don’t compare.
customer_reviews.author: Neesie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product 👍😁💗
customer_reviews.text: Great eyebrow shadow. Looks so natural on my sparse eyebrows. I ordered the taupe. My daughter loved it so much that I ordered her one too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Y.

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrows looking good
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder! I have blonde hair and use taupe. I like a darker brow.
customer_reviews.author: zen_blondie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Don’t came out when you put your finger very soft the color is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for gray hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of brow products. This particular one in taupe is great with my silver – gray hair.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Selzer

customer_reviews.title: Natural look!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for women with thinning brows
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE WOHLGEMUTH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect color and quicker than getting it anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Alla G.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and my daughter really liked it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Anastasia brow powder is the best! Have tried others brands - always go back to Anastasia. Color is perfect - no reddish undertones.
customer_reviews.author: WJB

customer_reviews.title: The value for cost
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but dislike the cost. At least you could replace the small gifts for coupons or parentage off.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for three years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brow powder
customer_reviews.text: Never use anything but this brow powder. Looks natural and stays on. Has 2 colors that you can blend just right.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brow powder. Actually the only brow powder I could find and I love it. It looks very natural and is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: A. Char

customer_reviews.title: very easy brows
customer_reviews.text: Just got this recently and it's working out great. The colors are soft and easy to blend and apply.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyebrow powder! It is light, but stays on all day. Fantastic coverage without looking fake.
customer_reviews.author: Teavy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Routine User Of This Product
customer_reviews.text: It was so much easier to purchase this item online than to ride to 50 minutes to my nearest retailer that carries it. As a prime customer, item arrived quickly! I've always been a fan of this product. Prefer powder over pencil. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RLochner

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great all around !!! easy to use product lasts for a long time. you should get the brow brush , wash it with your other makeup brushes.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Brow Powder Duo
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply and stays on all day. With having two colors you are able to match your hair color. I have very sensitive skin and have had no problems when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: eyebrow color
customer_reviews.text: I use the lighter color for my eyebrows. I wish I could order just the color I want.
customer_reviews.author: Renkatron

customer_reviews.title: Taupe is so hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: I used my moms brow powder while visiting her and loved it so much that I had to buy it for myself. It’s hard to find taupe brow anything! This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this eyebrow color for several years. I'm dark blonde but have increasing silver. Also very skimpy eyebrows. It gives a very natural effect, and you can blend it for more subtle or dramatic looks. Excellent product. Also had very quick delivery when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Usually don't review but this is a truly great beauty product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brow product I've ever used. Makeup artist for a work photo shoot had recommended it. I tried it and it looks wonderful does not look like that yucky caked on or drawn on appearance. I have very blonde light barely there eyebrows and use the ash blonde which is perfect. Needs to be used with good brow brush and the clear gel which comes in awhile brow kit or you can get separately.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for my eyebrows and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Van Man

customer_reviews.title: Natural Looking Brows for Fare Ladies
customer_reviews.text: Just the right color to add to brows that are vanishing. It's very natural looking when you apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Cipriani

customer_reviews.title: I got the taupe color this time and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the right color for my brow. I got the taupe color this time and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Muoi Quach

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times and I am very satisfied with it. I originally purchased the brow kit which is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: A perfect shade option for brown hair individuals with cool skin ...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect shade option for brown hair individuals with cool skin tones that are seeking a natural everyday soft look.. There is a bit a warmness in the lighter shade with gives my brows a bit of dimension. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AM_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, though a little darker then expected. Best I've found so far though.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product; use once a day and it stays!!
customer_reviews.author: karen hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Taupe Duo - Nice Brow  Color For a Brunette
customer_reviews.text: The taupe is a nice set of colors for the brows of a brunette. The darker colors produce a brow that is too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't apply well. Very dray and doesn't glide over skin surface for consistent application.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Rimel

customer_reviews.title: Great product for filling out brows
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good color, subtle enough for filling out brow
customer_reviews.author: bac123

customer_reviews.title: It lasts all day!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I’ve been using it for years. So happy to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M Sethman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks more natural than any other that I've had
customer_reviews.author: susan r kirk

customer_reviews.title: ... the brow wiz pencil and have not found a better eyebrow solution for my sparse brows
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily with the brow wiz pencil and have not found a better eyebrow solution for my sparse brows! Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Alison G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Anastasia is the BEST eyebrow powder I've used so far. It has some staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this adds good coverage over scars in the eyebrow hair line ,much better than pencil
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love Anastasia’s Brow Powder Duo. It stays on all day! The colors are perfect for brown eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Anne O. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for these colors and sizes, and I think I will continue to love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only brow make up I use...and don't test on animals
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Almost a substitute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother because this type of powder eyebrow makeup was no longer available through Mally. She says the color is OK, but it doesn't have the setting powder that was in the Mally product, so it doesn't stay put as well.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieL

customer_reviews.title: Super Ashy
customer_reviews.text: The browns are great coloring but i usually mix with taupe in other brand powders. This taupe feels way more ashy though. Not natural
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product and my first brow powder. I really like it. I probably could have used a lighter color, since I am only able to use the lighter of the two in this duo. I'm hoping it last longer than the Anastasia brow pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best brow
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I really Great product. I Have been using it for 4 years, and love it on my sparse, blonde brows. It is light and subtle. Looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: crazy8s

customer_reviews.title: This is a neutral brow powder
customer_reviews.text: This brow powder works well for women who are transitioning to the natural gray hair look.
customer_reviews.author: pvvillemar

customer_reviews.title: Nicer brows
customer_reviews.text: I have very little brow hair. I don’t like pencils because they look too harsh. I was using eye shadow but it isn’t easy to apply and it would fade-away. This is a firmer product than eye shadow and applies much more easily if used with a small wedge brush. And it stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I've always shied away from heavy brow pencils and whatnot. This powder duo is perfect if you want to highlight your brows with out looking overdone or tacky. I have bleach blonde hair and ash blond eyebrows, the color combo is perfect. It doesn't even smudge/wear off at the gym=win!
customer_reviews.author: adubwal

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Powder Duo, Taupe
feature_bullets: For Blonde hair with cool/ash undertones
A two-shade compact that gives a naturally textured, ombre finish.
Formula offers buildable intensity and seamless blending
Compact features two shades to provide multidimensional color and can be used to create an ombre finish
